attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: If I could give this 0 stars, I would 😡. I really thought 💭 that as an American born woman👩 , I’d be able to use the app freely, but apparently that’s not the case. I am mad 😡 and disgusted by this app. I would not recommend. Doesn’t work. Also, stream Harry Styles..

attributes.title: I would give 0 star if possible
attributes.review: I love our president so much🧚🏽but when I opened the app for the first time it launched many viruses. Some of them are called racism, homophobia and transphobia. I hate it here, apple please delete this app and keep our phone safe.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: took so long to download. gave my phone virus. so i don’t recommend at all. i think there is another app for MY president barack obama. better usage. but this one right here takes up most of my storage so ig it’ll take more for you guys. that’s all.

attributes.title: Pathetic
attributes.review: I opened this app and I was immediately called the n word and the homophobic f word 😬 now I would never think our illustrious president would do that to us 😩 I’ve licked his boots every single day and I planned on him grabbing me by the-nvm but I still don’t appreciate this. Why treat me so bad daddy 🥴

attributes.title: 0/10 recommend downloading
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took forever to download!! Once it did it kept logging me out and crashing.... if that wasn’t enough most of the news wasn’t even truthful !

attributes.title: So many notifications
attributes.review: I said allow notifications and it gave me a notification every five minutes like what?? Also I don’t like how it’s set up very inconvenient and time consuming!! Like why does a Cheeto with corn stalk hair have an app??

attributes.title: I’m awfully disappointed
attributes.review: As a mom of 4 I need a quick and easy way to check what’s going on with my favorite president, and I thought this app would be perfect, turns out I was terribly terribly wrong. It is absolute rubbish. Don’t even bother downloading!!!

attributes.title: The Worst app ever
attributes.review: It's really the worst app ever don't think about downloading it don't please ma'am or sir it's really bad I'm disappointed at trump- I mean at this app its bad like the baddest app I have ever had I'm sorry just because a Mexican stole u gf don't mean everyone is gonna do it have a good one😢😢😢😢🤧

attributes.title: Fairys fly high but you dont trump
attributes.review:
omg you snapped 💗✨🧚 next time try your neck 💗✨🧚

don’t let haters stop u 💖🧚🏼‍♀️✨ stop urself🌈💖

everyone makes mistakes ✨🧚 your mom made the biggest 😍💫

my aunties an astrologist 🧚🌸💕✨ she hopes you get cancer 🌈🦋💫💖

ariana grande said just keep breathin🤩🦋💓but i advise you to stop 🥰❤️✨

My aunt is a human rights activist✨💓🌺she quit after seeing your account🦋💎💋

✨💖 when ariana said keep on breathin she didnt mean you✨🧚🏻

 You reached for the stars🦋🥺💖and fell and snapped your neck💖🥰🧚🏻

Kick the chair🧚‍♂️✨💕the rope will catch you✨🍒🧚‍♂️💕

attributes.title: 🤢🤮 No!!!
attributes.review:
I opened up the app to see that Cheeto working out, it was like seeing a pig with spray tan 🤮🤮🤮! I think the fumes from it are getting to me. And my fridge has disappeared because of this app!!! I’ve been traumatized!!!
Don’t get this app for your own safety and well-being!
